document.full_text: the united nations human rights body voted thursday for the appointment of an investigator to monitor and report on iran in response to its crackdown on political dissent.
document.title: middle east: u.n. council establishes monitor for iran abuses
lines_and_colors: the united nations human rights body voted thursday for the appointment of an investigator to monitor and report on iran in response to its crackdown on political dissent.
